unnormalised: Hey, any update on Jadeja's knee? Heard it's bothering him since the WTC final. 15/06/2024 seems crucial for his rehab. Also, what's the deal with Bumrah's back? Doc said he'd be back by Diwali, but it's almost here! 25/10/2024. Hope he recovers soon, crucial for the upcoming ODIs. 10 km runs are a distant dream I guess! Prayers from Chennai for a speedy recovery. Also, any word on young Karthik from the MRF Pace Foundation?
normalised: hey, any update on Jadeja's knee? heard it's bothering him since the W T C final. fifteenth june two thousand and twenty four seems crucial for his rehab. also, what's the deal with Bumrah's back? doc said he'd be back by Diwali, but it's almost here! twenty fifth october two thousand and twenty four. hope he recovers soon, crucial for the upcoming O D I s. ten kilometer runs are a distant dream I guess! prayers from Chennai for a speedy recovery. also, any word on young Karthik from the M R F pace foundation?
